name: TinyTinyRSS
description: TinyTinyRSS (tt-rss) is a free, flexible, open-source, web-based news feed (RSS/Atom/other) reader and aggregator. It allows you to read feeds from multiple sources in one place, with features like article filtering, tagging, and sharing.

notes.text: A cron job to update feeds is configured at `/etc/cron.d/tt-rss-update-feeds` (runs every 15 minutes). This can be adjusted as needed.
